recipe.title: Tuna, Red Onion, and Parsley Salad
instructions: Whisk first 3 ingredients in medium bowl to blend. Mix in celery, onion, and chopped parsley. Stir in tuna. Season salad with salt and pepper. (Can be prepared 6 hours ahead. Cover and refrigerate.)
